meanings.definition: Not dented or marked by pressure or impact.
meanings.sent1: The undented car door looked shiny and new.
meanings.sent2: The undented surface of the table reflected the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent3: I wish my confidence was as undented as that car door!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an undented shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The undented armor protected the knight in battle.

meanings.definition: Not having any dents or indentations.
meanings.sent1: The undented can of soda was a relief after the mishap.
meanings.sent2: The undented walls of the house showed the quality of the construction.
meanings.sent3: His undented enthusiasm for life was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The undented path through the forest led to a hidden waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The undented helmet saved the soldier from harm.
